analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/35/0xcea0c353c95be6daf6ce9e3f18ddf714049185b0.sol:
	Contract ArtCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/35/0xcea0c353c95be6daf6ce9e3f18ddf714049185b0.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/35/0xcea0c353c95be6daf6ce9e3f18ddf714049185b0.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
